item.title: Infallibility & Inerrancy
item.description:
Infallibility & Inerrancy

"We're too busy reading the Bible and learning what is says, and it's making us miss so many opportunities to be the Church written about in the Bible. Understanding it gets us nowhere if we're not doing it!" - Rob Grunden

item.title: No title
item.description: This short paper is meant to inform the reader of the role of the Trinity, particularly with regards to both the inspiration and ongoing work of the Word of God. However, before we can jump into defining these roles, we must first define what is meant by “inspiration” and “ongoing work”. These two quick definitions will serve as foundational knowledge that must be understood before discussing the individual roles of Father, Son, and Spirit.
